string.value: #b#p2050001##k from #b#m221000000##k has requested your cooperation to save the world...

Boasting a firm build and intelligence, #o6220001# is a new type of robotic ordnance. But #o6220001# has been acting strangely as of late... It attacks everything including the Grays. #p2050001#, curious as to why #o6220001# has suddenly turned ill-tempered, has asked you to talk to #b#p2050002##k to gather information about #o6220001#.
When asked about #o6220001#, #p2050002# denies knowing anything about it... Hm, he seems suspicious.

The #p2050002#s vigilantly waiting to take over the world have added a new type of robotic ordnance. #r#o6220001##k. It's just as powerful and sturdy as a robot, but has the intelligence that rival that of Grays. Even the Mesorangers couldn't easily defeat Zeno.

But #m221000000# can't back down. A command has been given to protect the world against enemies no matter how powerful they may be. The problem lies somewhere else. #o6220001# has been acting rather strangely as of late... will you look into this?

Strangely, #o6220001# has been attacking not only the #m221000000# but the Grays as well. We need to find out whether it's simply a rebellion, or something has happened amongst the Grays. Please gather information for #b#p2050002##k.
Hmm... it seems you're not qualified for this job.
What is it? We, the Alien Grays, enjoy talking to humans, but we don't have time for a chat... What? You want to know about Zeno? Why are you so curious? Huh? Is there something going on with Zeno?

No... No way. Hahahaha. Of course there isn't anything going on. This human friend is so curious! I'm not in charge of Zeno so I don't know much. What's with the face? You don't believe me? If you don't have anything else to ask, get out of here!
#b(Hmmm... a bit suspicious... Let's report it to Dr. Kim.)#k
You haven't talk to an #bAlien Gray#k yet?
